channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken paving stone in Pickhurst Lane, 6th October
item.description:
There is a broken paving stone on the stretch of pavement in Pickhurst Lane alongside Pickhurst Green (between 198 Pickhurst Lane and entrance to Pickhurst Green). Please would you remove the stone and replace it with a new one.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickhurst Lane, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Branch fallen from tree outside 151 to 153 Mead Way, 6th October
item.description:
This tree has not been vandalised but a branch has fallen from the tree outside 151 to 153 Mead Way. This branch needs to be picked up and removed as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds growing in kerb on approach to 123 Mead Way, 6th October
item.description:
There are weeds growing in the kerb on the approach to 123 Mead Way. These weeds need to be sprayed with weed killer and the 'die-back' removed as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bin in Mead Way full to overflowing, 6th October
item.description:
The litter bin attached to lamp column M432 in Mead Way is full to overflowing and there is litter on the grass verge next to the bin. This bin needs to be emptied ASAP and the litter picked up and removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linkfield, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street weeds growing in Mead Way, 6th October
item.description:
There are weeds growing on the pavement between 47 and 65 Mead Way and on the footpath leading up to the next set of houses. These weeds need to be sprayed with weed killer and the 'die-back' removed as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven paving stone on approach to 123 Mead Way, 6th October
item.description:
There is an uneven paving stone on the approach to 123 Mead Way. Please would you inspect and take the necessary action to make sure the stone is re-laid and cemented in place so that it lies flat again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden stake knocked over outside 37 Kingswood Road, 6th October
item.description:
One of the wooden stakes that was installed to deter parking on the grass verge outside 37 Kingswood Road has been knocked down. Please would you take action to put the stake back upright and make sure that it is firmly fixed in place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingswood Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More fly tipping, 6th October
item.description:
Please remove this public bin. It will simply never end.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Private Hedge Blocking Footway, 6th October
item.description:
There is a large private hedge that is now almost entirely blocking the footway on the East side of Rectory Grove. The hedge seems to belong to number 33 Rectory Grove. It is making it very difficult for people using wheelchairs or buggies to get past.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Grove, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on Tabard street, 5th October
item.description:
There are food packaging, plastic bags and tin cans on Tabard Street alongside the Student building and Beckett House.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tabard Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep, wide pothole on road, 5th October
item.description:
This pothole almost lead to me having a bicycle accident. I don't know how long it's been there for.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Trafalgar Avenue, Old Kent Road, London
